comments.text:
I hit multiple instances of this assert when running the mochitest test_value_computation.html, too.  This can be seen when debug tinderbox logs (for "mochitest-4") hit  that test, too, e.g.:
http://tinderbox.mozilla.org/showlog.cgi?log=Firefox/1307550477.1307555316.21735.gz
(Warning: that log is large & may hang your browser. :))
